Good benefits

Senior management lacks involvement

review_title: I am looking to work somewhere else

pros: Well run healthcare system with good upper management that seems to have an eye for adapting to the changing healthcare environment. Good compensation and benefits. Nice place to live.
cons: Seniority doesn't mean much. Newer employees highly favored. Too much bias among the many, many layers of middle management. Not enough help on the lower levels due to budget concerns. Aging equipment with minimal upkeep.

pros: I had time off when I needed it.
cons: a lot of favoritism, they would have meetings and nothing that was said in the meeting was every done, they never took advice from employees they did not like. review_title: Overall, a great employer to work for.
